highlights: Extracted and transformed data from diverse healthcare data APIs such as MIMIC, Metriport, and Synthea
Developed a prototype using Next.js and optimized machine learning models for healthcare data analysis
Led the process model designing of a predictive ML model to enhance patient retention and streamline case management processes
Drove the automation of case manager dashboards to optimize operational efficiency and improve patient care delivery
Developed diverse funding strategies, leveraging SBA programs, rewards, and grants to sustain growth
Advised on partnerships with key distributors like Grainger and Uline to enhance market presence and drive sales revenue
Applied statistical methods to assess xUnit testing effectiveness, resulting in a 15% reduction in bugs
Generated reports and dashboards to communicate key performance indicators, achieving a 25% reduction in client-reported disruptions
